title: Guess My Favorite Pokemon - Win a FREE Skin!
body:
Herpaderp. 

Everybody gets one guess. Have fun :3

{{champion:432}} {{summoner:6}}

EDIT : 

HINTS (so far) ~ 

* Has nothing to do with BARD or GHOST
* Is Part of an Evolutionary Chain

I'm gonna go with Purugly, cause it's the same Dex number as Bard's technical champ number. You'd have to be a weirdo though.

Here's hoping you're a weirdo X3

Essentially, you're asking for the answer to a 650-or-so-choice multiple choice question, which, being fairly arbitrary in nature, cannot be reliably deduced. Now, one might induce an answer from the champion and spell icons, but if that is indeed a hint, it is remarkably obtuse. For example, and this is accepting as a given that the icons are a hint, two different people could very easily see two different connections between those icons and Pokemon, and thus arrive at two different answers.

While many who think that's a hint would guess a Ghost-type, Bard could be referring to anything. His mask might mean Yamask. His Magical Journey ability might mean Mismagius, the Magical Pokemon.

By contrast, if you'd picked {{item:3142}} as a hint, this would have been considerably easier.

That being said, I don't think it's anything from generation 1, 4, 6, or 7, because few, if any, from those generations are comparable to Bard. Narrowing it down further to the ones with the most possible resemblance among ghost-types (An easy task, considering most of them are malevolent clouds or possessed objects of some sort.), I get the impression that it's either Dusclops or Yamask. Ultimately, I've decided to guess **Dusclops**, since Yamask seems more like a Meep.

Of course, all of that conjecture assumed that those icons were a hint. If the icons have no bearing, then one may as well roll a d700.
Gloom! Nobody can resist that drooling cutie :)

First, all the posts with high up votes are interesting pieces that have been up for at least two weeks.

Second, this is an attention grab.

Third, Eevee.

Oh man, some people are sooooo close!

I mean at first I thought it was Arcanine based on the mane and moving fast...but then I looked more at the face of Bard and body of Ghost. Since you said that people are close, I looked at every Pokemon guessed so far. Growlithe was never guessed. However, Dragonair and Dragonite were both guessed, meaning that people were close. My guess is Dratini. Swiggly blue body with that generic face, the mane of bard being the "wings" of Dratini's head...

http://cdn.bulbagarden.net/upload/thumb/c/cc/147Dratini.png/250px-147Dratini.png

I'm going to guess Ninetails. Mostly because she is one of my favorites. A classic 1st gen pokemon, majestic, and has one of the best shiny versions out there. Not great when playing competitively, but still an amazing pokemon. 
My personal favorite is Farfetch'd.
Um is it Altaria? I think Altaria is so cute personally :3

Mewtwo everyone loves Mewtwo. He was a bit of a dick at first but now he pretty chilld.

BTW Why hasn't he tried to stop Ash. At this point that kid is causing more problems than Mewtwo every could of. For the greater good, he needs to put the boy down.
